title: Is League of legends down for anyone else?
body: After i finished a game, it instantly said something and gave me two buttons to click, Restart or Shutdown on lol. When i clicked restart league didnt pop up so i closed it in task manager and when i put in my login details, it doesn't let me in and gets stuck at the authenticating screen. I downloaded the recent update with all the new cool features.

replies.body: got the same thing, just get stuck at " logging on " on the alpha and legacy clients

Same issue. Tried restarting comp and using legacy client (doesn't work either).

EDIT: logged onto legacy client - it was a bit laggy and I cant get into matchmaking (got stuck in role selection for ranked).
I couldn't even get to that screen but you are on the old client, so that means its not the new update that caused it.
i was playing in the morning yesterday and now when i got on last night i couldn't log in, i s till can't log in. some of the riot websites won't even work for me so idk if its on my end

It looks like there were some server issues on OCE overnight per our [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#oce).  It doesn't seem to have lasted very long, and everything looks okay now!
I don't necessarily think its the servers. It happened to a friend of mine but not to me

Ive got the same issue. tried putting in the wrong password to see if it was a problem with connectivity, its not.
theres something wrong with the new client or on riots end and im leaning more towards it being on riots end as i have never had a issue with the new client
I even restarted my computer, so its the client that has the issue.

i dont think its a problem with the client as Derp69 said 
> [{quoted}](name=xDerp69,realm=OCE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=h1nswoYw,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-11-19T03:13:57.525+0000)
>
> Same issue. Tried restarting comp and using legacy client (doesn't work either).
Maybe a problem with the servers then
